oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An account of some of the different people found in Tamme's mother's country. 1) 9329v: the boys have never observed a female |ka kue person, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-5.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Peoples of !nanni and Tamme's country
